page.title: 19 OPINIONS
page.content: Fourteen people were asked their opinions on the following topics: employment,schooling,railways,computers newspapers,living conditions,health and the bus service. Is there enough employment? Yes 5,No 9. Is schooling better? Yes 12,Unsure 2. Should the railway have been removed? Yes 4, No 8,Unsure 2. Are the newspapers better? Yes 10,No 3, Unsure 1. Is living in the computer age good? Yes 10,No 1,Unsure 3. Are living conditions better? Yes 14. Are people more healthy? Yes 13,No 1. Is the bus service adequate?Yes3,No11.
